title: Effects of Microgravity on Plant Growth

sections.abstract: This study investigates how microgravity affects the root structure of Arabidopsis plants.
sections.methods: Seeds were germinated in controlled ISS conditions using the Veggie platform with nutrient films and LED spectra.
sections.results: Root growth direction was significantly altered in microgravity environments and lateral branching increased 32% over Earth controls.
sections.conclusion: Microgravity disrupts normal gravitropic signaling pathways in plants, requiring adaptive growth strategies for orbital agriculture.
